front.title: Common Interface to Cryptographic Modules (CICM) Logical Model

abstract.t: This document defines an abstract model for high assurance cryptographic modules. It defines the relevant terminology and high- level descriptions of the types of services and operations offered by such modules. The goal is to provide a common vocabulary for discussing the programming of high assurance modules. Comments are solicited and should be addressed to the mailing list at cicm@ietf.org.
